Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

CacheBehaviorPerPath.description: Describes the per-path cache behavior of an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution.

properties.name: Behavior
properties.description: The cache behavior for the specified path.

type.description: The cache behavior for the specified path.

properties.name: Path
properties.description: The path to a directory or file to cached, or not cache. Use an asterisk symbol to specify wildcard directories (path/to/assets/*), and file types (*.html, *jpg, *js). Directories and file paths are case-sensitive.

type.description: The path to a directory or file to cached, or not cache. Use an asterisk symbol to specify wildcard directories (path/to/assets/*), and file types (*.html, *jpg, *js). Directories and file paths are case-sensitive.

CookieObject.description: Describes whether an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution forwards cookies to the origin and, if so, which ones.

properties.name: CookiesAllowList
properties.description: The specific cookies to forward to your distribution's origin.

type.description: The specific cookies to forward to your distribution's origin.

properties.name: Option
properties.description: Specifies which cookies to forward to the distribution's origin for a cache behavior: all, none, or allow-list to forward only the cookies specified in the cookiesAllowList parameter.

type.description: Specifies which cookies to forward to the distribution's origin for a cache behavior: all, none, or allow-list to forward only the cookies specified in the cookiesAllowList parameter.

HeaderObject.description: Describes the request headers that a Lightsail distribution bases caching on.

properties.name: HeadersAllowList
properties.description: The specific headers to forward to your distribution's origin.

type.description: The specific headers to forward to your distribution's origin.

properties.name: Option
properties.description: The headers that you want your distribution to forward to your origin and base caching on.

type.description: The headers that you want your distribution to forward to your origin and base caching on.

QueryStringObject.description: Describes the query string parameters that an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution to bases caching on.

properties.name: QueryStringsAllowList
properties.description: The specific query strings that the distribution forwards to the origin.

type.description: The specific query strings that the distribution forwards to the origin.

properties.name: Option
properties.description: Indicates whether the distribution forwards and caches based on query strings.

type.description: Indicates whether the distribution forwards and caches based on query strings.

CacheSettings.description: Describes the cache settings of an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution.

properties.name: AllowedHTTPMethods
properties.description: The HTTP methods that are processed and forwarded to the distribution's origin.

type.description: The HTTP methods that are processed and forwarded to the distribution's origin.

properties.name: CachedHTTPMethods
properties.description: The HTTP method responses that are cached by your distribution.

type.description: The HTTP method responses that are cached by your distribution.

properties.name: DefaultTTL
properties.description: The default amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the content has been updated.

type.description: The default amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the content has been updated.

properties.name: MaximumTTL
properties.description: The maximum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

type.description: The maximum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

properties.name: MinimumTTL
properties.description: The minimum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

type.description: The minimum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

properties.name: ForwardedCookies
properties.description: An object that describes the cookies that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the cookies that are forwarded.

type.description: An object that describes the cookies that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the cookies that are forwarded.

properties.name: ForwardedHeaders
properties.description: An object that describes the headers that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the headers that are forwarded.

type.description: An object that describes the headers that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the headers that are forwarded.

properties.name: ForwardedQueryStrings
properties.description: An object that describes the query strings that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the query strings that are forwarded.

type.description: An object that describes the query strings that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the query strings that are forwarded.

CacheBehavior.description: Describes the default cache behavior of an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution.

properties.name: Behavior
properties.description: The cache behavior of the distribution.

type.description: The cache behavior of the distribution.

InputOrigin.description: Describes the origin resource of an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the origin resource.

type.description: The name of the origin resource.

properties.name: ProtocolPolicy
properties.description: The protocol that your Amazon Lightsail distribution uses when establishing a connection with your origin to pull content.

type.description: The protocol that your Amazon Lightsail distribution uses when establishing a connection with your origin to pull content.

properties.name: RegionName
properties.description: The AWS Region name of the origin resource.

type.description: The AWS Region name of the origin resource.

properties.name: DistributionName
properties.description: The name for the distribution.

type.description: The name for the distribution.

properties.name: BundleId
properties.description: The bundle ID to use for the distribution.

type.description: The bundle ID to use for the distribution.

properties.name: IpAddressType
properties.description: The IP address type for the distribution.

type.description: The IP address type for the distribution.

properties.name: CacheBehaviors
properties.description: An array of objects that describe the per-path cache behavior for the distribution.

type.description: An array of objects that describe the per-path cache behavior for the distribution.

properties.name: CacheBehaviorSettings
properties.description: An object that describes the cache behavior settings for the distribution.

type.description: An object that describes the cache behavior settings for the distribution.

properties.name: DefaultCacheBehavior
properties.description: An object that describes the default cache behavior for the distribution.

type.description: An object that describes the default cache behavior for the distribution.

properties.name: Origin
properties.description: An object that describes the origin resource for the distribution, such as a Lightsail instance or load balancer.

type.description: An object that describes the origin resource for the distribution, such as a Lightsail instance or load balancer.

properties.name: IsEnabled
properties.description: Indicates whether the distribution is enabled.

type.description: Indicates whether the distribution is enabled.

properties.name: CertificateName
properties.description: The certificate attached to the Distribution.

type.description: The certificate attached to the Distribution.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the distribution.

type.description: The status of the distribution.

properties.name: AbleToUpdateBundle
properties.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to your distribution, specified using the distributionName parameter, can be changed to another bundle.

type.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to your distribution, specified using the distributionName parameter, can be changed to another bundle.
